resources.string: Your account has been found! Click the Send Email button to send an email containing your username and password to the email you have associated with this account. Of course, you\'ll see your before you send the email, but sending it is advised to ensure you can easily access it should you lose it again.

There are 2 artbooks that make up The Visual Arts Notebook. The first one is the Private Journal which anyone can use anytime. The other is the Portfolio. But in use it, you have to be registered as an Student, Teacher, or Administrator.
